attributes.action: Free eye Checkup for the Spurs Fan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the Spurs Vs Chelsea match on 19/03/07, A Tottenham fan ran onto the pitch and attempted to punch Mr F. Lampard of Chelsea FC. This is a major cause for concern for many residents in London. 

It is clear that for any individual to fail to land a punch on a target of Mr Lampards magnitude, this individual is very likely to be suffering from some form of vision impediment. Therefore for the safety of all residents in London and the fan himself, I ask Mr Prime Minister to grand this Tottenham fan a free eye check-up at the local options.

Kind regards,

A very concerned London resident.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
